original_text: We sailed slowly for a number of days and arrived with difficulty off Cnidus, and as the wind did not allow us to go farther, we sailed under the lee of Crete off Salmone.
korean_text: 배가 더디 가 여러 날 만에 간신히 니도 맞은편에 이르러 풍세가 더 허락하지 아니하므로 살모네 앞을 지나 그레데 해안을 바람막이로 항해하여

sentences.original_text: We sailed slowly for a number of days
and arrived with difficulty off Cnidus
and as the wind did not allow us to go farther
sentences.korean_translation: 바람이 우리를 더 나아가게 허락하지 않아서

sentences.original_text: we sailed under the lee of Crete
sentences.korean_translation: 우리는 크레테의 바람 막은 곳을 따라 항해했으며
